queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.privileged is unset or false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.privileged is true

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev/net/tun' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev/net/tun' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev/kvm' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev/kvm' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev/snd' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev/snd' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev/ssd_data/default/release-name/.X11-unix' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev/ssd_data/default/release-name/.X11-unix' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/mnt/data/default/docker_osx/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/mnt/data/default/docker_osx/' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation is true

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.volumeMounts.name={{kvm}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.volumeMounts.name={{kvm}}.readOnly is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.volumeMounts.name={{boot-components}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.volumeMounts.name={{boot-components}}.readOnly is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.volumeMounts.name={{tun}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.volumeMounts.name={{tun}}.readOnly is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.volumeMounts.name={{snd}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.volumeMounts.name={{snd}}.readOnly is undefined

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/ssd_data/default/release-name/.X11-unix' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/ssd_data/default/release-name/.X11-unix' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/kvm' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/kvm' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/snd' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/snd' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/net/tun' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-docker-osx' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/dev/net/tun' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.description: Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Service has an external load balancer, which may cause accessibility from other networks and the Internet

files.expected_value: 'metadata.annotations' should be set
files.actual_value: 'metadata.annotations' is undefined

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

queries.description: Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{docker-osx}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{docker-osx}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: spec.containers[docker-osx].securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: spec.containers[docker-osx].securityContext.capabilities.drop is not defined

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{docker-osx}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is false

queries.description: Service should Target a Pod

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.ports.port={{5901}} has a Pod port
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.ports.port={{5901}} does not have a Pod port

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.ports.port={{8888}} has a Pod port
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.ports.port={{8888}} does not have a Pod port

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.ports.port={{10022}} has a Pod port
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-docker-osx}}.spec.ports.port={{10022}} does not have a Pod port
